title: Seek Adversity
itunes:title: Seek Adversity
description:
Episode 548 - Most people are afraid of adversity. The hard thing about growing as a person, is that adversity is required to grow. In this episode, I will teach your how to seek adversity so that you can strengthen yourself and grow into the person who you desire to be.
